title: Analyze Smart Pig Inspection Data
description: After a smart pig run, an integrity engineer analyzes the data to find and classify corrosion defects.

tasks.description: Load the raw data from the inline inspection (ILI) tool into the analysis software.
tasks.expected_outcome: The large dataset from the pig run is successfully loaded.

tasks.description: Run an algorithm to automatically detect and size potential metal loss features (corrosion).
tasks.expected_outcome: The software identifies hundreds of potential corrosion features.

tasks.description: Classify the most severe defects and calculate their remaining strength. Flag any defects that require immediate repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of actionable defects is generated, with one being flagged for immediate excavation and repair.
